name: Shattered Paradise
notes:
Requires Mono to be installed on your system: https://www.mono-project.com/download/stable/#download-lin or try 
Arch Linux/Manjaro:
"sudo pacman -S mono"

Debian/Ubuntu-based:
 "sudo apt install mono-devel"


Shattered Paradise will not launch and crash on boot without it.
content:
exe: ShatteredParadise-SP-Build-20181210.AppImage
files:
- file1: https://github.com/ABrandau/Shattered-Paradise-SDK/releases/download/SP-Build-20181210/ShatteredParadise-SP-Build-20181210.AppImage
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: file1
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/ShatteredParadise-SP-Build-20181210.AppImage
system:
  disable_runtime: true
